PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ValveTypeDrawOffCock
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from BS6100 250 6223: A small diameter valve, used to drain water from a cistern or water filled system.

PropertyDef.Name: HasHoseUnion
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the drawoff cock is fitted with a hose union connection (= TRUE) or not (= FALSE)
